arlut.csd.ganymede.common
Class CategoryTransport

java.lang.Object
  arlut.csd.ganymede.common.CategoryTransport
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class CategoryTransport
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class is intended to provide a serializable object that can be used to bulk-dump a static description of the category and base structures on the server to the client.

Method Detail

getTree

public CategoryDump getTree()
Client side accessor

addChunk

public void addChunk(java.lang.String text)

This method is provided so that server-side code can add chunks of data for serialization. In the CategoryTransport case, the DBBaseCategory.addCategoryToTransport(arlut.csd.ganymede.common.CategoryTransport,arlut.csd.ganymede.server.GanymedeSession, boolean) method is responsible for calling addChunk to build 'this' up for serialization.
